Package org.jeo.raster

Raster model.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Band
    A band or component of a raster dataset.
    RasterDataset
    A layer consisting of data organized into a grid.
    RasterDriver<T>
    Interface implemented by drivers for raster data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataBuffer<T>
    Wrapper around a ByteBuffer that abstracts away data type of values put into the buffer.
    NoData
    Helper class for handling no data values in rasters.
    Raster
    Result of a query against a RasterDataset.
    RasterQuery
    Describes a query against a RasterDataset dataset.
    Stats
    Statistics for a raster band including mean, standard deviation, and extrema (min/max).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Band.Color
    Enumeration for color interpretation.
    DataType
    Numeric data type enumeration.
    RasterDriver.Capability
    Raster driver capability enumeration.
